(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (PRP$ Our) (JJ eating) (NN adventure))
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP (DT the) (NN seafood) (NN paradise)))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (NNP Sandakan))))
    (VP (VBD got)
      (PRT (RP off))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (DT a) (JJ great) (NN start)))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (PRP$ our))
          (VP (VB guide)))))
    (, ,)))


poss(adventure-3, Our-1)
amod(adventure-3, eating-2)
nsubj(got-10, adventure-3)
prep(adventure-3, on-4)
det(paradise-7, the-5)
nn(paradise-7, seafood-6)
pobj(on-4, paradise-7)
prep(adventure-3, of-8)
pobj(of-8, Sandakan-9)
root(ROOT-0, got-10)
prt(got-10, off-11)
prep(got-10, to-12)
det(start-15, a-13)
amod(start-15, great-14)
pobj(to-12, start-15)
advmod(guide-18, when-16)
nsubj(guide-18, our-17)
advcl(got-10, guide-18)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Johnny))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Johnny-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBN brought)
      (NP (PRP us))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (NNP Sim) (NNP Sim)))
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP (NN breakfast))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, brought-1)
dobj(brought-1, us-2)
prep(brought-1, to-3)
nn(Sim-5, Sim-4)
pobj(to-3, Sim-5)
prep(brought-1, for-6)
pobj(for-6, breakfast-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Sim) (NNP Sim))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN settlement))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP (VBP consist)
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP
                  (NP (NN housing))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT that))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBZ has)
                        (VP (VBN been)
                          (VP (VBN built)
                            (PP (IN over)
                              (NP (DT the) (NN sea)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nn(Sim-2, Sim-1)
nsubj(settlement-5, Sim-2)
cop(settlement-5, is-3)
det(settlement-5, a-4)
root(ROOT-0, settlement-5)
nsubj(consist-7, which-6)
rcmod(settlement-5, consist-7)
prep(consist-7, of-8)
pobj(of-8, housing-9)
nsubjpass(built-13, that-10)
aux(built-13, has-11)
auxpass(built-13, been-12)
rcmod(housing-9, built-13)
prep(built-13, over-14)
det(sea-16, the-15)
pobj(over-14, sea-16)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN reason))
      (PP (IN for)
        (S
          (VP (VBG doing)
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP (DT this))
                (VP (VBZ is)
                  (SBAR (IN because)
                    (S
                      (NP (EX there))
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (ADVP (RB then))
                        (NP
                          (NP (DT no) (NN need))
                          (PP (IN for)
                            (NP
                              (NP (DT a) (JJ sewerage) (NN system))
                              (PP (IN as)
                                (NP (NN everything))))))))))))))))
    (ADVP (RB just))
    (VP (VBZ gets)
      (VP (VBN washed)
        (PRT (RP out))
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (NN sea)))))
    (. .)))


det(reason-2, The-1)
nsubjpass(washed-21, reason-2)
prep(reason-2, for-3)
pcomp(for-3, doing-4)
nsubj(is-6, this-5)
ccomp(doing-4, is-6)
mark(is-9, because-7)
expl(is-9, there-8)
advcl(is-6, is-9)
advmod(is-9, then-10)
det(need-12, no-11)
nsubj(is-9, need-12)
prep(need-12, for-13)
det(system-16, a-14)
amod(system-16, sewerage-15)
pobj(for-13, system-16)
prep(system-16, as-17)
pobj(as-17, everything-18)
advmod(washed-21, just-19)
auxpass(washed-21, gets-20)
root(ROOT-0, washed-21)
prt(washed-21, out-22)
prep(washed-21, to-23)
pobj(to-23, sea-24)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Housing))
    (VP (VBP like)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (DT these))
          (VP (MD can)
            (ADVP (RB still))
            (VP (VB be)
              (VP (VBN seen)
                (PP
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NNP Malaysia)))
                  (CC and)
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NN contrast))))
                (PP (TO to)
                  (NP (NNP Singapore)))
                (SBAR
                  (WHADVP (WRB where))
                  (S
                    (S
                      (VP (VBG having)
                        (NP (DT a) (NN house))
                        (PP (IN by)
                          (NP (DT the) (NN sea)))))
                    (VP (VBZ is)
                      (NP (DT the) (JJ ultimate) (NN luxury)))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(like-2, Housing-1)
root(ROOT-0, like-2)
nsubjpass(seen-7, these-3)
aux(seen-7, can-4)
advmod(seen-7, still-5)
auxpass(seen-7, be-6)
ccomp(like-2, seen-7)
prep(seen-7, in-8)
pobj(in-8, Malaysia-9)
cc(in-8, and-10)
conj(in-8, in-11)
pobj(in-11, contrast-12)
prep(seen-7, to-13)
pobj(to-13, Singapore-14)
advmod(luxury-25, where-15)
csubj(luxury-25, having-16)
det(house-18, a-17)
dobj(having-16, house-18)
prep(having-16, by-19)
det(sea-21, the-20)
pobj(by-19, sea-21)
cop(luxury-25, is-22)
det(luxury-25, the-23)
amod(luxury-25, ultimate-24)
advcl(seen-7, luxury-25)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN in)
      (NP (NNP Sandakan)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, in-1)
pobj(in-1, Sandakan-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP they))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (VP (VBN considered)
        (NP (JJ cheap) (NN housing))))
    (. .)))


nsubjpass(considered-3, they-1)
auxpass(considered-3, are-2)
root(ROOT-0, considered-3)
amod(housing-5, cheap-4)
dobj(considered-3, housing-5)
